posts.author: EatPreyLuv
posts.content:
1) PvM or PvP - A bit of Both

2) Level cap - 20

3) Race preference - Elf or Human (Preferably Elf)

4) Class preference - Just cleric really but open to 1-2 level multiclass ideas that buff its survivability would prefer at least 17 cleric for 9th level spells

5) Melee preference - Strength, and/or Cha, Sword and Board

6) Range preference - WIS (spells)

7) Weapon preference - Longsword

8) Maximum item enhancement - +1/+2 stat, +4/+5 ac/attack/enhancement

9) Spellcasting - Buffing spells and AOE battlefield control spells

10) Custom factors - divine might/shield is 5 rounds + cha modifier
